default.shortDescription: ClearPeople is the creator of Atlas, an award-winning digital workspace solution for Microsoft 365. Knowledge, communication and collaboration are brought together beautifully to engage and empower your team, wherever they may be.
default.featuredTitle: Atlas Digital Workspace – the only all-in-one platform for Microsoft 365
featuredParagraphs: Do more with Microsoft 365. Often promised, rarely delivered – until now. Everyone is being asked to do more with less and Atlas is the way to achieve this. Atlas connects knowledge to people quickly, improving productivity and measurably saving time. Quantifiable efficiency, improved outcomes. Every time.

Sell more with Atlas. Your customers need accurate information, quickly. Informed customers mean faster sales cycles. Atlas quickly connects your employees and trusted partners to the information your customers need to make informed buying decisions faster. Every time.

Achieve more. With Atlas your digital transformation becomes a more natural process. Open, clear communication rapidly becomes the standard. Major change is managed and implemented effectively. Every time.

callToAction.title: Connect knowledge to people in the all-in-one platform for Microsoft 365
callToAction.description: Start your Atlas Digital Workspace journey and bring knowledge, communication and collaboration together.
